text.description: Our assignment was to create a Web application, which uses the user's location and shows a list of places of interest near by. The user interface should look good and be intuitive (UX)
text.feature1: The user will see additional information about places of interest when the place is selected
text.feature2: The user can view the places of interest in a map
text.feature3: The user can see a weather forecast for the next 3 hours
text.feature4: The user can also view activities and events
text.feature5: The user can filter places / activities / events
text.api: The data used in the Web application will be accessed through the MyHelsinki Open API https://open-api.myhelsinki.fi
text.purpose: In addition to coding, the purpose of the project was to practice the use of Scrum, Git and Microsoft Azure CI/CD pipelines or something similar
text.duration: The whole project duration was eight weeks that had been divided into four two-week sprints
text.assignment: The project was a school assignment in Business College Helsinki
